description:
cmd/go: run examples in source order, not name order

Add Order field to doc.Example and write doc comments there.

Fixes issue 4662.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, iant@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7229071/diff/2001/src/cmd/go/test.bash
File src/cmd/go/test.bash (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7229071/diff/2001/src/cmd/go/test.bash#newcode283
src/cmd/go/test.bash:283: ./testgo test testdata/example[12]_test.go
I think you forgot to add testdata/example[12]_test.go to this CL.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8dfcf31fb1f8 ***

cmd/go: run examples in source order, not name order

Add Order field to doc.Example and write doc comments there.

Fixes issue 4662.

R=golang-dev, iant
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 7229071: cmd/go: run examples in source order, not name order
